rules_text:
Whenever this creature or another outlaw creature you control dies, put a bounty counter on target permanent. [i](Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws.)[/i]
Whenever you complete a bounty, you lose 1 life and draw a card. [i](You complete a bounty when a permanent you don't control with a bounty counter is put into a graveyard from the battlefield.)[/i]
